summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement to Pacific Northwest Bell Telephone Company across the City of Seattle City Light Department's PNT transmission line right of way in the southwest quarter of Section 31, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., King County, Washington (Vicinity of North 92nd Street and Fremont Avenue North). (P.M. \#260431-3-302).
